name: Alt of Ctrl (Enezio)
description:
Oh gosh, you have less than one hour to send your copie... I mean, your full original homework.

But your Ctrl has revolted itself against you (know what I mean? no ctrl C, no ctrl V) and now you have to capture it back if you wanna finish your task. THAT'S IT GAMER. YOUR CTRL IS OUT OF CONTROL!!! or alt of? can't remember.
